long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adblock for Chrome - Your Essential Ad Blocker

Adblock for Chrome is your ideal solution for a cleaner, quicker, and more secure browsing experience. This extension boosts your web performance with a comprehensive set of filter lists and advanced features, all working autonomously.

Main Features:

- Efficiently blocks ads, banners, and pop-ups
- Prevents ads from appearing on external websites
- Halts the loading of preroll ads
- No configuration necessary, with no complex lists to maintain
- Blocks all pre-roll video ads on almost any site
- Consistently blocks banner and text ads
- Completely free and regularly updated

If you find Adblock for Chrome helpful, weâ€™d appreciate your positive feedback.

Note: To provide you with the best experience, our extension periodically checks for updates from our server. This requires the "alarms" permission, but rest assured that no personal information is tracked or stored during this process. These updates help ensure your extension remains up-to-date and functions smoothly.
